#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
vector<string> v;
int main()
{
int i,j,t;
char code[101],temp[101];
string str1[5]={"8","w8","gr8","4","b4"};
string str2[5]={"ate","wait","great","for","before"};
cin>>t;
cin.getline(code,101);
while(t--)
{
cin.getline(code,101);
for(i=0;i<strlen(code);i++)
{
j=0;
while(i<strlen(code)&&code[i]!=' ')
{temp[j]=code[i];j++;i++;}
temp[j]='\0';
v.push_back(temp);          
}
for(i=0;i<v.size();i++)
{
for(j=0;j<5;j++)
{
if(v[i]==str1[j])
{v[i]=str2[j];break;}
}
}
for(i=0;i<v.size();i++)
cout<<v[i]<<" ";
cout<<endl;
v.clear();
}
return 0;
}
